title: Optimising Inkjet Printing for Research in the Life Sciences
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: New data allowed us to develop a novel cryopreservation method Healthcare Cultural
findingsText: This was a 12 month proof of principle award to investigate how substrates can be patterned with sugars such as heparin to influence the behaviour of stem cells attached to the surfaces. Although some encouraging results were found, the project terminated before significant findings could be achieved.  Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
